data.title: A bit chilly in winter
data.text: We attended a company's Christmas party last year at the Armory.  The room was ample in size for all of us, the food buffet and the gifts.  It seemed a bit chilly.  The place is clean and lit appropriately for dinner.

data.title: Event hall for rent?
data.text: Our office rented the Tacoma Armory for a holiday party.  The facility is going through a remodel, but it might be one of the best kept secrets in Tacoma.  A HUGE roller rink with balcony, reminiscent of the 50s. A catering company leases the small, cozy but terrific space adjacent. Great food, great location, tastefully remodeled. Keep this one on the radar for future event halls.
